content: I think I'll start by researching my surname on the Polish State Archives (NAC) and the Ukrainian Archives (DAKO) websites to see if I can find any records related to my surname. I'll also try to explore the Polish Genealogical Society (PTG) and the Ukrainian Genealogical Society (UGS) resources to see if they have any information on my surname. Additionally, I'll use the Ukrainian Surname Database to learn more about the origins and history of my surname in Ukraine.
